title: A Comprehensive Guide to Research
text:
Preface
Research can be tedious and arduous particularly if one is without a mentor. Even with mentorship, it requires perseverence and fortitude. This motivated my decision to share a resource that can guide young scholars as they navigate the research terrain.
At Arewa Data Science Academy, we have a vision of creating the next generation of researchers that are deeply skilled in Data Science and Machine Learning, which is why we provide free topnotch mentorship to hardworking and motivated youngsters.
In this resource, I intend to share valuable resources that can significantly ease the ability of our young scholars to perform qualitative research.

title: 1  Introduction
text:
1.1 Advice to New Researchers
There are as many paths to research as there are researchers. Every researcher has what worked and what did not work for him/her. However, the following are a few generic advice that works for all:

Practice writing skills and make sure you learn to enjoy research
Be curious and explore how things work. This will help in making your research more grounded.
Participate in scientific discussions with peers as this can unlock new insights you never saw on your own.
Perseverance in times of difficulty as with research, inevitably there will be times where one will feel like quitting due to the challenges that come up.
Look for mentors to guide and ease your research journey
Develop presentation skills.
Work on your happiness and mental health. Your personal well being is most important. Understand this.
